 2009-18702009-11-19,  ,  ,  HEALTH, 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Medical Devices Regulations (1461 â€” Quality Management System Certificates)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MEDICAL DEVICES REGULATIONS (1461 QUALITY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM CERTIFICATES), to address observations made by the Standing Joint Committee on the Scrutiny of Regulations and to reflect the full range of activities that a registrar may undertake; to clarify the pre-conditions before which the Minister will recognize a person as a registrar, as well as the circumstances under which cessation of recognition may take place; and to explicitly recognize that quality management system (QMS) registrars have an opportunity to be heard where the Minister intends to cease to recognize these persons as registrars.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0303 Publication Date: 2009-12-09
AttachmentsAttachment
